elements.name: LandingText
elements.html:
The goal of this survey is to collect information about you and your beloved animal companion's experience with the disease of laryngeal paralysis or GOLPP (Geriatric-Onset Laryngeal Paralysis and Polyneuropathy). To take the survey, you'll be required to remember details about your LP/GOLPP journey.

We know how hard it is to lose one's beloved companion. If your companion has recently crossed over the Rainbow Bridge, maybe it's best to do the survey later when you've had time to heal.

First, we'll explain what information we'll collect and how we'll ensure your privacy and data security. Then we'll ask for your consent to continue the survey. If at that point, you feel like talking about it would open too many wounds, we encourage you to stop and come back later when when you're ready.

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText01
elements.html: We're not asking for your last name, so we have no way to connect you with any of your private data. We need only four pieces of information to ensure that we can verify survey results:

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText02
elements.html:
• Your first name
  • Your companion animal's name
  • The country in which you live
  • Your email address or Facebook account name

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText02
elements.html: With this info, we can ensure that all the survey respondents are unique and verifiable without having to collect any information that makes you identifiable outside the context of the survey. For details about how we'll use the data we collect and further steps we'll take to anonymize your contact information, select the 'About your privacy' and 'Consent information' links.

elements.name: LandingConsentHeading
elements.html: By clicking the checkbox below, you confirm that you're ready to answer questions about your LP companion and consent to the terms of our privacy and consent statements.

elements.name: LandingConsent
elements.title: Do you consent to our privacy terms as required to participate in this survey?

elements.name: LandingConsentTrue
elements.html: Thank you! Please select Next to begin the LP/GOLPP Survey 2026 sponsored by LarParLife.org

elements.name: LandingConsentFalse
elements.html: Your consent is required in many countries and some US states. If you change your mind, please feel free to come back any time and participate in the LP/GOLPP Survey 2026 sponsored by LarParLife.org.
